name: Florence Fang Community Farm
description: The mission of Florence Fang Asian Community Garden is to reclaim public land and grow healthy communities.
fullDescription: The mission of Florence Fang Asian Community Garden is to reclaim public land and grow healthy communities.
whatTheyOffer: They aim to improve food security, increase healthy living habits, practice natural farming techniques, improve the environment, support neighborhood economic opportunity, and increase social connections within and between communities of color.
